body:
Comment 1 by **emilliken**: 
There's one other way to trigger this.  If the client has no open sessions, then instead
of a channel request, the server will send down a globalRequest, with wantReply set to
true.  The Go client prints:

mainLoop: unhandled message *ssh.globalRequestMsg: &{keepalive@openssh.com true}

A failure message should be sent back from the client to server.
